It has English audio, but only Dutch and French subs. It's too annoying to have to download it first and then realise no English subs. At least for me, it was a download of 4 G's of rubbish. It doesn't make the net any faster, so people try to put the correct info.

first, this is not "southamerica", it's Chile and its politic process is too diferent to other countries from the same subcontinent.
puede haber elementos similares (algo de historia durante la colonia, el idioma, la economía seudocapitalista, semifeudal) pero el proceso político es único, de aquí deriva su característica principal.
en todo caso, el casting es espectacular.
